title: national express font?
content:
Hi, I need to find out what font was used to create the national express font as shown in the attached logo. you can also see it on the homepage- [http://www.nationalexpress.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120102172209/http:/www.nationalexpress.com/ "http://www.nationalexpress.com/")

I have a Brand Identity job on and I think it really suits the logo i've designed...

Much appreciated for your help in advance, I will post up logo and type when its finished.

thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot008.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120102172209/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot008.jpg) | 39.24 KB |
author: lazcook

comments.content:
I noticed that recently and thought how poorly executed it was. It's probably a custom logo by some big design agency in London but it's crap.

Use something else.

Nick Cooke

thats a fair point however the client is rather keen to use it aswell so I dont want to dissapoint them. I have a feeling it is a custom one aswell- could it be VAG or bpprelay but just adapted a lot?

I have just checked and none of those fonts are similar enough, can anyone recommend other fonts that I can use as a starting point?

thanks, regards

Laurence
